select item.id,item.name,dict.name as dictName,item.dict_id,com.name as compName,item.created_at,item.created_name,item.order_by,item.modified_at,item.modified_name from s_dict_item item left join s_company com on item.comp_id=com.id left join s_dict dict on item.dict_id=dict.id where item.is_delete = 0 and dict.is_delete = 0
and item.comp_id in ('0',#{compId})
and item.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and dict.name like CONCAT('%',#{dictId},'%')
ORDER BY dict_id DESC,order_by ASC
limit #{pageNo},#{size}
